comments:
Driver:  wtp-sdk-M-M200603071817-200603071817.zip

Started up Eclipse with JRE 1.5.0_02-b09.

When creating a dynamic Web project targetting Tomcat 5.5, the check box to add the project to an EAR is enabled.  If I check that and hit Finish, I got the error:

!MESSAGE Failed while installing Dynamic Web Module 2.4.
!STACK 0

egate.java:163)

This was a problem with a few builds of WTP 1.0.1 but the problem was not there for a while (the add to EAR check box was disabled).  The problem is showing up again with the recent WTP 1.0.2 build.
